export default function Card({ url, title, paragraph, link, buttonText }) { function handleClick(event) { alert("Bienvenido a releevant!"); console.log("Boton pulsado: " + event.target.innerText); } return (
{title}

{paragraph}

{buttonText}

{paragraph}

{buttonText}

{buttonText}

{buttonText}
); }
